title: Force & Torque Conversions – N, kgf, lbf, N·m, lbf·ft

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General formula (linear) \( \text{target} = \text{value} \times \frac{\text{factorFrom}}{\text{factorTo}} \) For force, the base unit is Newton (N). For torque, the base unit is Newton-metre (N·m).

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
